channel.title: VM on Ryan Tolboom
channel.description: Recent content in VM on Ryan Tolboom

item.title: Hands On with Cloud-init
item.description: I remember talking to a friend about AWS a few years after we had both finished our undergrad degrees. He described it to me like this: Imagine you could take a Linux distro, install it, and set someone up with an SSH shell as soon as their credit card cleared. That’s AWS. — Mike At this point, mid 2000s, we had both had plenty of experience with SSH and I used to jokingly say that it didn’t matter what computer I used because I was just using it to get to something better anyway.
